channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukrainian soldier crawled for days through drone kill-zone
I’m 40, getting divorced and need $70K to buy out the house for me and the kids. Do I borrow or use my 401(k)?
Where U.S., South Korea relations stand after massive ICE raid at Hyundai plant
I was in the stands as Donald Trump watched the US Open. Here’s what really happened
Florida’s surgeon general said he didn’t calculate the costs of ending vaccine mandates in the state. But scientists have.
Oklahoma school bus crash carrying softball team injures multiple people
item.description: A school bus carrying a softball team has crashed in Oklahoma, injuring multiple people

item.title: Police say man killed retired Auburn University professor at a public park
item.description: Authorities say a retired veterinary professor was attacked and killed in a park in Auburn, Alabama

item.title: Appeals court hears from US military contractor ordered to pay $42M to former Abu Ghraib detainees
item.description: An appeals court is set to hear oral arguments from a U.S. military contractor ordered to pay $42 million for contributing to the torture and mistreat...

item.title: Hurricane Kiko weakens into tropical storm but could create dangerous surf in Hawaii
item.description: Forecasters say Hurricane Kiko has weakened into a tropical storm but still could create life-threatening surf and rip currents in Hawaii

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Monday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Monday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 26-28-41-53-64, Powerball: 9
